Catholic Church. Pope, 1691-1700 (Innocentius XII)
metadata.call_number: Case Wing folio Z144 .A1 v. 2 no. 93
metadata.description: "Condamnation et défense faite par Nostre Tres-Saint Pere Innocent par la Providence Divine Pape XII. du livre imprimé à Paris en 1697. sous ce titre, Explication des maximes des saints sur la vie interieur, &c.": p. 6-12
The work in question is by Fénelon
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Damaged, torn, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Title page and cover are combined.
